resources:
s Simpill Welcome to Simpill :) Thank you for choosing Simpill!

To create your first pill, select the plus button at the bottom of your screen.
Next Previous Settings About addPillButton Pill Time Pill Bottle Icon tick undo Pill Name Melatonin Take daily at 10:00pm Reminder Date Pill Name? Time? Refill Date? clock calendar Create New Pill Cancel Simpill is a medication reminder app.

In order to respect your privacy, Simpill doesn't contain any trackers, ads or unnecessary permissions.

Simpill is an open-source application which means its code is available for everyone to see and audit.

Source code: https://github.com/StephenPowerPND/Simpill

Noticed any bugs or have some suggestions? Feel free to contact me.

My email: simpilldev@gmail.com

If you enjoy using Simpill and would like to make a donation, you can do so via cryptocurrency.

Below, I have listed my crypto addresses. All donations are greatly appreciated! :)

You are already in the About section! pill name It's time to take your medication: I Have a TARDIS The reminder date you have set is in the past. Unless you have a TARDIS, I would not recommend this. Incorrect date set? Pill Name Dialog null Pill added :) pill time pill date pill amount is pill taken time taken bottle color Delete Pill Are you sure you want to do delete this pill?

This cannot be undone! Delete Back Ok Create Pill Enter Pill Amount Enter Pill Amount Enter Pill Name Stockup Reminder Don't forget to stockup on your soon :) Unless you have access to a TARDIS, the date cannot be set in the past. Please set a date for your refill reminder. error Reset Pill taken Pill updated :) Your pill supply amount must be greater than 0. Pill name must begin with a letter. Error! Please fill out all of the fields first :) Would you like to update the bottle color of this pill? Update Pill Bottle Color?
